content: canoe shawl a uniquely constructed scrappy crochet shawl by judy jewell of the autumn acorn -1- copyright 2020 the autumn acorn pattern is intended for personal use only other uses are strictly prohibited all rights reserved notes this shawl was designed to be a meditative peaceful crochet project you can leave in a basket near your bed to work on just a few row each night before drifting off to sleep easy and intuitive perfect project for using up all those leftover sock yarn scraps and advent calendar minis materials leftover scraps of sock yarn or fingering weight mini skeins my finished shawl took approximately ten 20 g mini skeins of yarn or 200 grams/7 5 ounces 800-900 yds of sock yarn notions 2 st markers needles/hooks us size i/9/5 50 mm crochet hook gauge 14 sts & 11 row = 4 in double_crochet blocked finished measurements 98 long x 21 wide canoe shaped shawl -2- copyright 2020 the autumn acorn pattern is intended for personal use only other uses are strictly prohibited all rights reserved abbreviations chain chain double_crochet double_crochet dc5tog double_crochet 5 together ea each half_double_crochet half_double_crochet repeat repeat slip_stitch slip_stitch st stitch decrease together shawl chain 182 work 1 double_crochet across until there are 2 sts left place st marker work 1 double_crochet in next st work 6 double_crochet in last st turn your work counterclockwise so you are looking at the bottom of the foundation chains working along these foundation chs work 1 double_crochet across until there are 2 chain sts left place st marker work 1 double_crochet in next chain st work 6 double_crochet in last st 374 double_crochet to change colors you will attach a new color at beginning of each round *always work current color to 1 double_crochet before ea st marker attach new color cut old color + work 1 double_crochet then work 6 double_crochet into double_crochet at right end of shawl continue to work 1 double_crochet in ea double_crochet around remembering to work until 1 double_crochet before st marker at left end of shawl work approximately 23 stripes of color -3- copyright 2020 the autumn acorn pattern is intended for personal use only other uses are strictly prohibited all rights reserved border attach new yarn color for the 2 row of border round 1 work 1 half_double_crochet in ea st around entire shawl working 6 half_double_crochet at ea end round 2 *slip_stitch into next 4 sts work a dc5tog bobble into next half_double_crochet repeat from * around entire shawl finishing weave in all loose ends soak shawl in warm soapy water roll in towel to remove excess moisture and reshape/lay flat to block final notes a huge thank you to everyone who has helped make this pattern possible for more of my
